name: The Episodic
description:
This game is about Astronaut who came back to the earth and find out that the earth is destroyed by a something big, player needs to find out what caused this problem.

Features:

Immersive Experience: In this game you will experiencing something like never before, with Realistic Graphics and Cool Sound Design.

Investigate: Investigating abandoned world on your own in search of weird anomaly.

Challenging: Feel the extremely challenging world

Unveil The Secret: Discover lost world
